statements: UPDATE CurrencyBalances SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE VirtualGoods SET price = 10.50, item_name = 'New Item' WHERE item_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE CurrencyBalances SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE player_id = '5a4390ba-3c91-4eda-8d50-f4cf078d69d9' AND currency_name = 'Coins';
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, amount = 500.75 WHERE player_id = '07f393e4-ef9a-4945-ae2c-bd9f5bed88c1' AND transaction_type = 'Purchase';
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = balance + 1000.50 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE transaction_history SET description = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 456
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE transaction_history SET description = 'Deposit' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = 150 WHERE player_id = 100;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE player_id = 200;
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE virtual_goods SET price = price * 1.1, available_quantity = available_quantity - 1 WHERE item_id = 54321;
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = 500.00 WHERE player_id = 1234 AND currency_type = 'USD';
UPDATE player_data SET username = 'new_username', last_login = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 5678;
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE player_id = 12345 AND currency_type = 'Gold';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 50.75, timestamp = NOW() WHERE player_id = 54321 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = 1500.75 WHERE user_id = 123 AND currency_type = 'USD'
UPDATE user_info SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance = balance - 50.75 WHERE user_id = 123 AND currency_type = 'USD';
UPDATE purchase_history SET amount_paid = 100.00, purchase_date = NOW() WHERE purchase_id = 456;
